page.title: 02Houses in North Bradley
page.content:
The oldest part of North Bradley is Church Lane and The Rank some of the houses in these two roads are two hundred or more years old.
Most of the houses are less then 15 years old .The houses in Broadley Park ,Pine Walk, St Nicholas Close, Collage Gardens,Churchlands are all bulit in the last 15 years .The Churchlands estate is made up only of bunglows.
A new house at the bottom of Pine Walk is detached house with four bed -rooms and two bath rooms is cost about Â£57'000.
There are few council houses in North Bradley. There are some very big expensive houses in there own grounds.
